summary: Configuration container for the BridgeTower multimodal transformer model, encapsulating architecture hyperparameters such as hidden size, number of layers, attention heads, activation function, and options for sharing cross‑modal or bridge/link transformer layers, as well as nested text and vision sub‑configurations.
business_intent: Enable developers to customize and instantiate a BridgeTower model with specific architectural settings for multimodal (text‑vision) tasks, facilitating reproducible model creation and fine‑tuning.
